metadata.description: eBPF network performance testing parameter specification
metadata.source: Generated from spec config: Performance Test Specification

test_cases.name: system_network_perfomance_metrics_rx_protocol_tcp
test_cases.command: sudo python3 ebpf-tools/performance/system-network/system_network_perfomance_metrics.py --internal-interface port-mgt --phy-interface enp24s0f0np0 --src-ip 192.168.70.32 --dst-ip 192.168.70.31 --direction rx --protocol tcp --latency-us 100
